tasks.title: Setup Project Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the development environment for SpendSense.
tasks.details: Set up a new project using Docker for containerization. Use Python FastAPI for the backend and React with Next.js for the frontend. Ensure SQLite is configured for local database management.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the Docker container builds successfully and the application starts with a single command. Ensure all dependencies are correctly installed.

tasks.title: Generate Synthetic Data
tasks.description: Create a system to generate synthetic transaction data matching Plaid API structure.
tasks.details: Implement a Python script to generate 50-100 synthetic users with diverse financial profiles. Ensure data includes checking, savings, credit card, money market, and HSA accounts. Use deterministic generation with seed values and export data to CSV/JSON.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate that the generated data matches the Plaid schema and includes 180-day transaction history for all users. Check for diversity in financial behaviors.

tasks.title: Implement Consent Management System
tasks.description: Develop a system to manage user consent for data processing.
tasks.details: Create endpoints to handle user consent using FastAPI. Implement database tables to track consent status and timestamps. Ensure consent is required before any data processing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test that users cannot proceed without providing consent. Verify that consent can be revoked and processing stops immediately.

tasks.title: Develop Behavioral Signal Detection
tasks.description: Create a module to detect financial behavior signals from transaction data.
tasks.details: Implement algorithms to compute signals such as subscription detection, savings growth, credit utilization, and income stability. Ensure calculations are deterministic and handle missing data gracefully.
tasks.testStrategy: Run tests to ensure signals are detected accurately and within performance constraints (<1 second per user). Validate edge cases.

subtasks.title: Develop Subscription Detection Algorithm
subtasks.description: Create an algorithm to detect recurring subscription payments from transaction data.
subtasks.details: Implement logic to identify patterns in transaction data that indicate recurring subscriptions. Handle various frequencies and amounts, and ensure the algorithm can adapt to changes in subscription patterns.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with datasets containing known subscriptions to validate detection accuracy.

subtasks.title: Develop Savings Growth Detection Algorithm
subtasks.description: Create an algorithm to detect growth in savings from transaction data.
subtasks.details: Design an algorithm to analyze transaction data for patterns indicating savings growth. Consider factors like regular deposits, interest accrual, and account balance trends. Ensure the algorithm is robust against fluctuations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with historical data to ensure accurate detection of savings growth trends.

subtasks.title: Develop Credit Utilization Detection Algorithm
subtasks.description: Create an algorithm to detect credit utilization patterns from transaction data.
subtasks.details: Implement logic to calculate credit utilization rates from transaction data. Consider credit limits, spending patterns, and payment behaviors. Ensure calculations are accurate and handle missing data gracefully.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate against known credit utilization scenarios to ensure accuracy.

subtasks.title: Develop Income Stability Detection Algorithm
subtasks.description: Create an algorithm to detect income stability from transaction data.
subtasks.details: Design an algorithm to assess income stability by analyzing transaction data for regular income deposits and variability. Ensure the algorithm can handle irregular income patterns and missing data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with datasets containing varied income patterns to ensure stability detection is reliable.

tasks.title: Build Persona Assignment System
tasks.description: Assign financial personas to users based on detected signals.
tasks.details: Define criteria for each persona and implement logic to assign personas based on signal data. Prioritize personas when multiple criteria are met. Store assignments in the database.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that personas are assigned correctly and deterministically. Check that prioritization logic resolves multi-persona cases accurately.

tasks.title: Create Recommendation Engine
tasks.description: Develop an engine to generate personalized educational recommendations.
tasks.details: Implement logic to generate 3-5 educational items per user. Include eligibility checks and plain-language rationales. Use a template for rationale format and ensure all recommendations cite specific data.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure all recommendations include a rationale and meet eligibility criteria. Validate that content is at an 8th-grade reading level.

tasks.title: Implement Consent & Guardrails System
tasks.description: Ensure recommendations respect user consent and eligibility guardrails.
tasks.details: Integrate consent checks into the recommendation process. Implement eligibility checks to prevent ineligible offers. Develop tone guardrails to ensure recommendations are empowering and non-judgmental.
tasks.testStrategy: Test that no recommendations are generated without active consent. Verify that ineligible offers are filtered out and tone checks catch problematic language.

tasks.title: Develop Operator Dashboard
tasks.description: Create a dashboard for operators to review and manage recommendations.
tasks.details: Build a React-based interface for operators to view user profiles, signals, persona assignments, and recommendations. Include functionality to approve, override, or flag recommendations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test that operators can access all necessary information and perform actions within 5 seconds. Ensure all actions are logged.

tasks.title: Implement Evaluation & Metrics Harness
tasks.description: Create a system to evaluate and report on system performance and fairness.
tasks.details: Develop an automated pipeline to compute metrics such as coverage, explainability, relevance, and latency. Generate summary reports and ensure deterministic evaluation.
tasks.testStrategy: Run the evaluation pipeline and verify that all target metrics are met. Check that reports are generated correctly and metrics are exportable.

tasks.title: Design Database Schema
tasks.description: Create the database schema to support SpendSense functionalities.
tasks.details: Design and implement the SQLite schema as specified in the PRD. Ensure tables for users, accounts, transactions, liabilities, signals, personas, recommendations, and audit logs are created with appropriate relationships.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the database schema supports all required operations and maintains data integrity. Test CRUD operations for each table.

tasks.title: Develop API Endpoints
tasks.description: Implement API endpoints for user management, data processing, and recommendations.
tasks.details: Create endpoints using FastAPI for user management, signal processing, persona assignment, and recommendation retrieval. Ensure endpoints are secure and performant.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each endpoint for correct functionality and response times. Validate that endpoints handle edge cases and errors gracefully.

tasks.title: Setup Frontend Interface
tasks.description: Develop the frontend interface for SpendSense using React and Next.js.
tasks.details: Create a responsive UI using Tailwind CSS. Implement pages for user consent, profile viewing, and operator dashboard. Ensure seamless integration with backend APIs.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the frontend for usability and responsiveness. Verify that all components render correctly and interact with the backend as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Testing Framework
tasks.description: Set up testing frameworks for both frontend and backend.
tasks.details: Use pytest for backend unit and integration tests. Implement Vitest for React component testing. Ensure comprehensive test coverage for all critical functionalities.
tasks.testStrategy: Run all tests and ensure they pass. Verify that tests cover edge cases and critical paths.

tasks.title: Deploy Application
tasks.description: Deploy the SpendSense application using Docker.
tasks.details: Configure Docker for deployment. Ensure the application can be started with a single command using docker-compose. Document deployment steps in the README.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the deployment process to ensure the application starts correctly and all services are operational. Verify that the environment is consistent with development.

tasks.title: Conduct Risk Mitigation Testing
tasks.description: Test the system for potential risks identified in the PRD.
tasks.details: Perform tests to ensure inappropriate recommendations are not generated. Validate synthetic data against real patterns. Test performance with 100+ users and consent tracking reliability.
tasks.testStrategy: Run risk mitigation tests and verify that all identified risks are addressed. Ensure comprehensive logging and monitoring for ongoing risk management.
